TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Brushes extends System.Object

summary.span: 實作一組預先定義的 物件。

span.span: Implements a set of predefined objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Presentation Foundation 中的色彩名稱符合.NET Framework 中，Windows Form 中的色彩名稱和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie-md.md)]。Color names in Windows Presentation Foundation match the color names in the .NET Framework, Windows Forms, and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie-md.md)]. 這些色彩，而且其名稱為基礎的 UNIX X11 色彩值。These colors and their names are based on the UNIX X11 color values. 下圖顯示每個預先定義的筆刷、 其名稱和十六進位值的色彩。The following image shows the color of each predefined brush, its name, and its hexadecimal value. ![預先定義的色彩](~/add/media/art-color-table.png "預先定義的色彩")![Predefined colors](~/add/media/art-color-table.png "Predefined colors") 色彩表包括色樣、 色彩的名稱和十六進位值Color table including a color swatch, the color name, and the hexadecimal value 請參閱多種其他、 更複雜，您可以繪製區域的類別。See the class for a variety of other, more complex, ways that you can paint an area. 例如，請嘗試使用漸層 (， ) 或映像 ()。For example, try using gradients (, ) or images (). ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage 您無法宣告這個 managed 的類別[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，但是您可以使用靜態屬性指派值在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You cannot declare this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], but you can use its static properties to assign values in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush AliceBlue { get; }
.property class System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush AliceBlue
Public Shared ReadOnly Property AliceBlue As SolidColorBrush
public: static property System::Windows::Media::SolidColorBrush ^ AliceBlue { System::Windows::Media::SolidColorBrush ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得純色填滿色彩，其十六進位值為 #FFF0F8FF。

span.span: Gets the solid fill color that has a hexadecimal value of #FFF0F8FF.
A frozen with a of #FFF0F8FF.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為已凍結這個屬性所傳回筆刷 (其屬性是**true**)，無法以動畫顯示。Because the brush returned by this property is frozen (its property is **true**), it can't be animated. 如需如何建立動畫 SolidColorBrush 資訊，請參閱[How to： 建立動畫的色彩或 SolidColorBrush 的不透明度](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-animate-the-color-or-opacity-of-a-solidcolorbrush.md)。For information about how to animate a SolidColorBrush, see [How to: Animate the Color or Opacity of a SolidColorBrush](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-animate-the-color-or-opacity-of-a-solidcolorbrush.md). 請參閱類別頁面使用方式資訊，包括範例，以及預先定義的系統色彩的清單。See the class page for usage information, including examples, and for a listing of predefined system colors. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```
